titleStmt.title: SII 7.123: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 123. (A.R. No. 111 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
murukuntu kāñciyum vañciyuṅkoṇṭa moyttārmakataṉ tirukuṅ kaṉaika
ḻal vikkiyanāḷ cīparāntakaṉil perukuṅ kurutippunal vāytoṟum pilavāy ma
ṭuttup parukuṅ kaḻutuṭaṉ cemmaikoṇṭāṟkum paṉikkaṭale maṭṭiyaṉṟe
ṟiya tārpuṉaivāṇapurantara nī veṭṭiyiṉṟe koṉṟa veṇmaṇip poṭiyutira veḷḷa
ttoṭṭi yeṉṟeṉun tollai vāṇṭe tulaiyāta panti ṭṭi yaṉṟe tevvar pāypari
ttāṉai kalakkuvate vāroṉṟumulaiyāy maṟṟava roṉṟum paḻuturaiyār makataive
ntaṉ poroṉṟu puriyāmuṉ periya kuṟicciyileḻunta pukaiye kaṇṭāy kāraṉṟu kaṉale
riyai miṉṉeṉṟu taḷarelk kāraikkāṭṭilūroṉṟu matiḷviḻunta peraoliyu murumatirva
tokkuṅ kāṇe koṅkuṅ kaliṅkamuṅ koṇṭa kaṇṭā koṭitte rutiyar taṅkumpati koṇṭavā
ṇātipā taṇiyātateṉkol poṅkuñ ciṉappaṭai vaṅkāraciṅkan puraṇṭu viḻacceṅkunṟa miṉ
ṟu piṇakkuṉṟa mākkiya termaṉṉaṉe muṉiporu paṭaikkaṭalai viṭ
ṭaracarāṉār mūlataṉamum pariyu muṟaimuṟai yaṉivārit teṉpakai yaṭakkiyapiṉ
vāṇakulatīpaṉ ceyta taṉiyāṇmai vaṭatikkila ṟikiṟpīr piṉporuporuppa
raṇ viṭāmalaiyamāṉaip porayiliṟ porutapotoru perumpor vaṉpa
ṟai taviṟttoru kutiraivaliyāl viṉaivāyppaṟai taviṟtorukoliṉ vali
yāle cūḻum piṇavaṇaimel toykaḻukiṉ pantaṟkiḻ vīḻum kaḻukiṉaṅkaḷ
meykāppa vāḻun taṉ toṉṉakare pol vaṭukar tuñcat tuyiṟṟiyate maṉṉa
varkoṉ mākatarkoṉ vāḷ colliviṭu cerumīṉavar cūḻumurimai koṭāḻkaṭa le
lli viṭupaṭaai veṟuvareṉu miyamapuriyeṟuvar kolliviṭumutakātipā kūḷikarutilarur
puka valli viṭum Ayirāpatam vāṇaṉ varaviṭunāḷaiye .
Digital edition of SII 7.123 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
